# Factors are ordered
model.tree.1 = rpart(
  cbind(Exposure, Nbclaims) ~ Gender + DriverAge + CarAge + Power + Area + Fract + Leasing, 
  data=base_train_ordered,
  method = "poisson",
  parms = list(shrink=4), # Method is deviance
  control = rpart.control(cp = 0.005, xval = 10, maxdepth = 50)
)
